reviews.review:
Its an Avengers movie I'll give it that...
This was trying to be another crazy adventure... AND IT SUCEEDS ENTIRELY

In the latest Deadpool 2 trailer, the anti-hero tells Cable that he is, "So dark!"  Then, he follows up the comment with a question:  "You're sure youre not from the DC Universe?"

In all honesty, I want to ask the same question of this film.  While it definately has the over-the-top humerous comments and antics you expect from characters like Thor and Star Lord, I found much of it - and not just the ending - to be overly depressing.

Well, given the direction in which the story was headed, it kind of had to be, right?  Still - just being honest here - I enjoyed the movie less as a result.  It didn't quite achieve the... balance of tone that a really good move that ends on a bad point - like The Empire Strikes Back - needs to achieve.

So while this film is definately wothy of a viewing - and I'm certainly eager to see where things end up in next year's follow up offering - I very much doubt I'll be watching this film a second time, as I have with so many other films in the Marvel space.

As such, I award Avengers Infinity War 3 1/2 out of 5 stars.  Thanks to everyone involved with the film!
This was an excellent movie! I loved this film a lot because of the great cast, the great visual effects and the entire film was done perfectly phenomenal! It’s a must see film!

I went into the theater with sky-high expectations, having seen the ratings online and hearing how some friends were absolutely hyped about it. Ngl. I was spoiled about parts of the ending scene, but that didn't really ruin the movie for me anyways.

I honestly think it was an amazing movie, with really likable characters, great humour that mostly doesn't feel forced, beautiful shots and effects, and a plot and ending that left all 10 of us guys that went to watch the movie with our mouths wide open saying "WOOOOW", even though some of us knew parts of the ending.

5/5 for me, definitely go watch it if you can :) - But do watch the movies before this one... anything else would just be silly. x)

In a way, this movie expands on every aspect that has come to define the MCU over time - including the bad ones. To counter that though, is the dizzying amount of visual spectacle; heroes; and gags, and interwoven with each other they constitute one of the grandest and most daring films of its kind. Sure, it's the first of two parts, and that realization dampens some of the emotional impact of the movie's conclusion before long, but even then, 'Infinity War' is awesome and it earns my respect for being what it is.
Not the best Marvel movie, but action-packed and entertaining.
Fantastic fun action movie. The best Avengers movie yet x
Brilliant movie worth all the hype and the character plots that come into being after all the waiting really paid off in this epic blockbuster.

Does not match the hype.
What I liked 

Spider-man
Iron-man
GOG
Some funny spots

What I didn't like

SPOILERS

I think they missed it separating the all the heroes fighting in different locations. 

It left, so many questions like no Antman/Hawkeye because of the family?  The world is about to be destroyed.  

Why no CM, they call her at the end.  Come on!  

End of credits not worth waiting for. 

Whey was CA tired during the big fight, but Widow was even out of breath.

Some corny green screen shots.

Why did Doctor Stange save Tony to let others die (which obviously are coming back)

Many more ????
